name: DDrive
description: A lightweight cloud storage system using discord as storage device written in nodejs

DDRIVE_TOKEN.description: A secret discord token to access discord server/channels.

DDRIVE_CHANNEL_ID.description: Id of Discord text channel where all messages were stored.

DDRIVE_AUTH.description: Optional basic username:password to secure your ddrive site. Example: admin:password123

DDRIVE_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Size of chunk (part) to be uploaded to discord in bytes. Max 8MB for bot token and 500MB for nitro user token

DDRIVE_TIMEOUT.description: Time in ms before upload request to discord server will be aborted. Increase it if you have slow internet
